question:
Which of the following are true regarding a revolution?
(a) Change of Constitution
(b) One ruling elite is replaced by another
(c) Transformation in Political Institutions
(d) Fundamental change in the Socio-economic and political structures
explanation:
Revolution is a fundamental and relatively sudden change in political power or political organization, therefore, a revolution can be summed up as -
(a) Change of Constitution
(b) One ruling elite is replaced by another
(c) Transformation in Political Institutions
(d) Fundamental change in the Socio-economic and political structures
